document.full_text: the discount tour bus that crashed in the bronx last month, killing 15 people, was traveling at its maximum speed of 78 miles per hours just before it slammed into a highway sign pole, said a federal report released on friday.
document.title: bus in bronx crash was speeding just before accident
lines_and_colors: the discount tour bus that crashed in the bronx last month, killing 15 people, was traveling at its maximum speed of 78 miles per hours just before it slammed into a highway sign pole, said a federal report released on friday.
